mapper.select: /* 자주찾는질문 조회 */ SELECT F.FAQ_NO, F.REG_PF_ID, C.FAQ_CTGRY_TYPE, F.FAQ_TTL, F.FAQ_CN, F.MDFCN_PF_ID, F.ACT_YN, F.REG_YMD, F.MDFCN_YMD FROM FREQUENTLY_ASKED_QUESTIONS AS F INNER JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY AS C ON F.FAQ_CTGRY_NO = C.FAQ_CTGRY_NO;
mapper.update: UPDATE FREQUENTLY_ASKED_QUESTIONS AS F INNER JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY AS C ON F.FAQ_CTGRY_NO = C.FAQ_CTGRY_NO SET C.FAQ_CTGRY_TYPE = #{faqCateType} WHERE F.FAQ_NO = #{faqNum};
